flawed_nl_solution:
The bigger sail will make the trip in 4 hours because 200 / 50 = <<200/50=4>>4
The smaller sail will make the trip in 10 hours because 200 / 20 = <<200/20=10>>10
The bigger sail will be 4 hours faster because 10 - 4 = <<10-4=4>>4
